extendedInfo.description: Papo de bar app helps you control your tabs by taking notes of beers, drinks, fries and other things on a bar or restaurant. Close the account, calculate tip or discount and divide by number of people, all at the finger tips.And while closing the account, why not share your drinking with your friends?

reviews.title: Muito \303\272til
reviews.comment: Esse app passou a fazer parte do almo\303\247o com os amigos.
reviews.author: A Google User
